#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <climits>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <list>
#include <deque>
#include <stack>
#include <set>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <bitset>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define vt vector

int main()
{
	int t,e,o;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d %d",&e,&o);
		if((e+o)%5!=0)
			printf("-1\n");
		else
			printf("%d\n",abs(((e+o)/5)*2-e));
	}
	system("pause");
	return 0;
}
